shortdef: filled with energetic excitement and enthusiasm

dt: {bc}to work a pump {bc}raise or move a fluid with a pump
{bc}to exert oneself to pump or as if to pump something
{bc}to move in a manner that resembles the action of a pump handle
{bc}to raise (something, such as water) with a pump
{bc}to draw fluid from with a pump
{bc}to pour forth, deliver, or draw with or as if with a pump
{bc}to manipulate as if operating a pump handle
{bc}to cause to move with an action resembling that of a pump handle
{bc}to transport (something, such as ions) against a concentration gradient by the expenditure of energy
{bc}to excite (atoms or molecules) especially so as to cause emission of coherent monochromatic electromagnetic radiation (as in a laser)
{bc}to energize (something, such as a laser) by {a_link|pumping}

shortdef: to work a pump : raise or move a fluid with a pump
to exert oneself to pump or as if to pump something
to move in a manner that resembles the action of a pump handle

dt: {bc}a hydroelectric system in which electricity is generated during periods of high demand by the use of water that has been pumped into a reservoir at a higher altitude during periods of low demand

shortdef: a hydroelectric system in which electricity is generated during periods of high demand by the use of water that has been pumped into a reservoir at a higher altitude during periods of low demand

dt: {bc}to fill with or as if with air {bc}{sx|inflate||}

shortdef: to fill with enthusiasm or excitement
to fill with or as if with air : inflate

dt.t: The author {it}pumps out{/it} a book every year.
